name: hdw-werbeagentur/hdw-wordpress-theme
description: A WordPress Boilerplate Theme by HDW

scripts.post-create-project-cmd: npm i && composer run-script copy-env && composer run replace-textdomain
scripts.replace-textdomain: DIR=$(basename $PWD); npm run process-replace "TEXTDOMAIN" "${DIR}" "{config,resources}/**/*.{php,js,scss}" && npm run process-replace "TEXTDOMAIN" "${DIR}" *.{php,js,scss,css} && npm run process-replace "TEXTDOMAIN" "${DIR}" ".env";
add-acf-module: MODULE=$(read -p 'How should be the module named?: ' MODULENAME && echo $MODULENAME); (cd resources/modules/ && composer create-project --stability=DEV --remove-vcs hdw-werbeagentur/hdw-acf-module-boilerplate ${MODULE});
